attributes.action: Ban Drinking Alcohol untill 18 not just buying it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is illegal to buy Alcohol under 18.
So why is it ok to drink alcohol at five and over.
Alcohol is a depressant drug. Users can end up feeling very down.
Girls get more drunk than Boys on the same amount of alcohol consumed and they can also develop drink-related health problems earlier than boys.
Young people seem to be drinking alcohol
more openly than ever before since it is not illegal to drink alcohol only to buy it.
With so many outlets now providing alcohol.
Is it not our  responsibility  to protect our young in society and guide them in the right directions.
Long term over-use can lead to serious
Liver,Heart and Stomach problems.
More and more young people in our areas are admitted to Hospital with acute
Alcohol intoxation needing emergency
treatment with fatal outcomes.
This Habit is increasing so why do we not do something about it now before it could end up being one of your children.
